src:
Delitev na zgornji in spodnji razred
05 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Aleš Sorta

Že lep čas ni bilo v prvi slovenski nogometni ligi tako izrazite delitve na zgornjo in spodnjo polovico. Tudi na vrhu je gneča. Prvo četverico ločita le dve točki, kar v preostalih štirih jesenskih krogih obeta še zanimivo dogajanje na domačih zelenicah.



Predrag Sikimić (v belem dresu) je z 11. prvenstvenim golom priigral točko Sežancem proti Rudarju.  Foto: Matej Glavina

NOVA GORICA > Vodilna Olimpija in branilec naslova Maribor pričakovano krojita vrh, precej bolj presenetljivo pa jima delata družbo Mura in še zlasti Aluminij. Sobočani in Kidričani se lahko pravzaprav pohvalijo z najboljšim izkupičkom na slovenski sceni. Ne gre pozabiti, da so se oboji prebili v polfinale slovenskega pokala. Imajo pa tudi lepe možnosti, da prihodnjo pomlad dvignejo lovoriko. Med pokalno četverico sta namreč še drugoligaša Radomlje in Nafta. Prav uspeha v pokalnem tekmovanju sta Muri in Aluminiju očitno vlila novih moči. Vsaj tako gre sklepati po razpletih 16. kroga. Gotovo ekipama, ki se bosta za prvenstvene točke pomerili v nedeljo, ni zmanjkalo strelskih nabojev.
Zmagi Mure in Aluminija pa vendarle ne sodita v kategorijo presenečenj. Domžalčani so tudi v Kidričevem potrdili ranljivost v obrambi, potem ko se je že zdelo, da so strnili vrste. Na povratnem pokalnem obračunu z Muro in gostovanju v Kidričevem so skupaj prejeli sedem golov. Nič jim ni pomagalo, da so v 180 minutah štirikrat zatresli mrežo tekmeca. Izpad iz pokalnega tekmovanja in občuten točkovni zaostanek za mesti, ki vodijo v Evropo, bržkone že pomeni, da bodo po daljšem času ostali brez evropske vozovnice.
10točk je razlike med petimi Celjani in šestimi Sežanci
Pri Olimpiji po porazu z Muro, ki ji je že v Stožicah odščipnila dve točki, vendarle ni te bojazni. So pa drugi pomisleki, vezani na organizacijski in finančni ustroj kluba, potem ko se bo poslovil mecen Milan Mandarić. Že zimski premor bi utegnil dati določene odgovore, v kakšne vode bo spomladi zaplula ljubljanska barka. Tekmovalna izhodišča vendarle niso slaba. Resda so Olimpiji Aluminij, Mura in Maribor po enkrat sneli skalp v dosedanjem delu prvenstva. V Stožicah so remizirali tudi petouvrščeni Celjani.
Sicer pa Olimpija ni oddala niti točke proti moštvom iz spodnjega dela lestvice, kar ni najboljša popotnica za Cherrybox24 Tabor, ki bo v Stožicah gostoval v nedeljo. Sežanski točki doma proti Rudarju vendarle ne gre gledati pretirano v zobe, zlasti po razvoju dogodkov in izenačujočem golu, ki so ga dosegli v sodnikovem dodatku. Šestouvrščeni Tabor je pred Velenjčani ohranil enajst točk naskoka, pred devetim Bravom pa je še nekoliko povečal prednost.
Štiri točke dobropisa sicer še ne pomenijo brezskrbne popotnice za preostanek jeseni, v katerem bo Bravo poskušal zasukati trend. V soboto je doživel tretji zaporedni poraz, Maribor je po sežanski zaušnici očitno spet utrdil obrambne okope. Proti Celjanom in Bravu je vknjižil minimalni zmagi, s katerima še naprej diha za ovratnik Olimpiji, pri čemer se privrženci prvakov vendarle nadejajo, da se bodo vijolice razcvetele spomladi.
text:
Division into upper and lower classes
05 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Aleš Sorta

It was not a good time in the first Slovenian Football League that such a split was divided into upper and lower halves. The top is crowded too. The first four are separated only by two points, which in the remaining four autumn rounds promises even more interesting happenings on the native greens.



Predrag Sikimić (in white jersey) scored the Sežance point against Rudar with the 11th championship goal. Photo: Matej Glavina

NOVA GORICA> The leading Olympia and the defender of the Maribor title are expected to make the summit, and much more surprisingly are the companies Mura and especially Aluminij. Sobocans and Kidricans can in fact boast the best proceeds on the Slovenian scene. It should be remembered that they both made it to the semifinals of the Slovenian Cup. But they also have a good chance of raising their laurels next spring. The other four teams are Radomlje and Nafta. It was the success of the cup competition that brought Muri and Aluminij new strengths. At least this is the conclusion of the rounds of Round 16. Certainly the teams that compete for the championship points on Sunday have not run out of shots.
Mura and Aluminum wins, however, do not fall into the category of surprises. In Kidric, the locals also confirmed the vulnerability in the defense, after what appeared to be a collapsed species. In total, they scored seven goals in the return cup match with Mura and their appearance in Kidričevo. Nothing helped them to shake a rival's net four times in 180 minutes. The elimination of the cup competition and the considerable point lag behind the cities leading to Europe, probably already means that after a long time they will be left without a European ticket.
10 points is the difference between five Celje and six Sežani
At Olympia after her defeat with Mura, who had already scored two points in Stožice, she is not afraid. However, there are other concerns about the club's organizational and financial structure after the farewell of Milan Mandaric. Even a winter break might give some answers as to what water the Ljubljana barge will sail into in the spring. However, the starting points are not bad. It is true that the Olympians Aluminij, Mura and Maribor once took off their scalp in the championship so far. In Stožice, five-ranked Celje citizens also remade.
Moreover, Olympia did not score a point against the teams from the bottom of the rankings, which is not the best trip for Cherrybox24 camp to host in Stožice on Sunday. However, the sežana points at home against Rudar should not be over-looked, especially after the events and the equalizing goal scored in the referee's supplement. The six-ranked camp maintained eleven points above the Velenje team and slightly increased the lead before the ninth Bravo.
The four points of the credit, however, do not yet represent a worry-free trip for the rest of the fall, in which Bravo will try to twist the trend. He suffered his third consecutive defeat on Saturday, and Maribor clearly consolidated his defensive trenches after the Sežana mumble. He recorded a minimal victory against Celje and Bravo, with which he continues to breathe by the collar of Olympia, with followers of the champions still hoping that the violets will bloom in the spring.
